commands.statement: SELECT @COMPANY_NO AS COMPANY_NO , @START_YN AS START_YN , @START_DATE AS START_DATE , @END_YN AS END_YN , @END_DATE AS END_DATE , @CUMMUTE_DATE AS CUMMUTE_DATE , @SITE_NAME AS SITE_NAME;

SELECT 'OK' AS OK1;
SELECT 'OK' AS OK2;

WITH recursive CTE AS ( SELECT PROGRAMID , PROGRAMNAME , PARENTID , PROGRAMNAME AS PARENTNM , VIEWYN , FNREAD , FNUPDATE , FNPRINT , FNEXCEL , FNPREPRINT , FOLDERYN , ASSEMBLYNAME , CLASSNAME , SEQ , SEQ AS SORTNUM FROM FR_PROGRAM WHERE PARENTID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT P1.PROGRAMID , P1.PROGRAMNAME , P1.PARENTID , CTE.PROGRAMNAME AS PARENTNM , P1.VIEWYN , P1.FNREAD , P1.FNUPDATE , P1.FNPRINT , P1.FNEXCEL , P1.FNPREPRINT , P1.FOLDERYN , P1.ASSEMBLYNAME , P1.CLASSNAME , P1.SEQ , CASE WHEN CTE.PARENTID IS NULL THEN P1.SEQ * 100 ELSE CTE.SORTNUM + P1.SEQ END SORTNUM FROM FR_PROGRAM P1 INNER JOIN CTE ON CTE.PROGRAMID = P1.PARENTID ) SELECT PROGRAMID , PROGRAMNAME , PARENTID , (SELECT PROGRAMNAME FROM FR_PROGRAM WHERE PROGRAMID = CTE.PARENTID) AS PARENTNM , VIEWYN , FNREAD , FNUPDATE , FNPRINT , FNEXCEL , FNPREPRINT , FOLDERYN , ASSEMBLYNAME , CLASSNAME , SEQ SORTNUM FROM CTE ORDER BY SORTNUM;
SELECT * FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_NO IN (${$CONCURRENTCOMPANYNO});
